title: samayamidaruL purivAi
sahitya:
samayamidaruL purivAi shubhakara 


anupallavi

  nittiya mangaLakaran unadaDi tozhudiDa


caraNam 1    magizh tara varuvAi manadoDu tudittiDa mA tuyariDu
bhuvi tanilun tiruvaruL tarap-pala tuyarara unadaDi magizh pera
    caraNam 2    unadaDi tozhavE varu iDar aganriDadA tiru malaraDi
dayavuDan enadagam tanil irundiDavum nin tiru mukhattoLi pera
    caraNam 3    bhuvi tanil aDiyEn uyir uDal poruLoDu pUraNa manaduDan
pugazh karam tanil tara pugazh padam aLittiDa paranunil sukhittiDa
    caraNam 4    aruL taru karanE agamagizhvunil pera AdarittiDa tudi 
agamagizhum uDan paDittiDa malar teLittiDa diDha manadaLittiDa
